mapper.select: SELECT version FROM ${format}_component WHERE AND name = #{name};
mapper.update: UPDATE ${format}_component SET kind = #{kind}, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , entity_version = COALESCE(entity_version, 1) + 1 WHERE AND kind != #{kind};
UPDATE ${format}_component SET attributes = #{component.attributes}, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , entity_version = COALESCE(entity_version, 1) + 1 WHERE AND attributes != #{attributes};
mapper.select: SELECT component_id FROM ${format}_asset WHERE repository_id = #{repositoryId} AND component_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY component_id HAVING MAX(last_downloaded) <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - CAST(#{daysAgo} AS INT) * INTERVAL '1' DAY LIMIT #{limit};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ${format}_asset WHERE component_id = ANY(#{componentIds}); DELETE FROM ${format}_component WHERE component_id = ANY(#{componentIds});
DELETE FROM ${format}_asset WHERE component_id = ANY(#{componentIds}::int[]); DELETE FROM ${format}_component WHERE component_id = ANY(#{componentIds}::int[]);
